text: Barrie Colin Keeffe (31 October 1945 – 10 December 2019) was an English dramatist and screenwriter. He was best known for his screenplay for the 1980 film The Long Good Friday. In 2010, his screenplay for Sus was one of his last works. Keeffe died on 10 December 2019 in London after a short-illness, aged 74.Barrie Keeffe, Writer of Classic British Gangster Movie ‘The Long Good Friday,’ Dies at 74 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in London Category:English playwrights Category:Screenwriters from London
title: Barrie Keeffe
